name: Super Space-Stronaut (freeves)
description:
Space Station Escape

My 2d Platformer Project

Modifications from Source

  1.  Created a new enemy Drawing/sprite (Acid Enemy found near acid pools)
  2.  Created New Enemy Animations (Acid enemy)
  3. Created a New Pick up Drawing - Anti-Gravity  Pickup
  4. Created Script for Anti-Gravity Pickup that reduces gravity force on a player.
  5. Created 2 unique levels in addition to source project,
  6. Created Breakable Tiles.
